ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

cookingTips: Mix all ingredients except soda in a large container and freeze in an ice cream maker if you have one, or in a freezer with occasional stirring
For a smoother slush texture, stir every 2-3 hours while freezing, or blend halfway through freezing
Add the lemon-lime soda just before serving to maintain carbonation and bright flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a party punch that can be made ahead. How do you prefer your slush texture—thick and icy or more liquid? That affects freezing time.
